metadata.description: Ant-Man steals the spotlight as the MCU Guidebooks' comprehensive coverage of the fan-favorite Marvel Studios films and Marvel Television shows continues!  Get small with profiles and updates on Ant-Man characters and organizations including Scott Lang, Hank Pym, Hope van Dyne, Darren Cross, Antony, Mitchell Carson, Falcon, Peggy Carter and Howard Stark! Relive the thrills of 2015's Ant-Man with the latest entry of the Cinematic Universe reference books!
metadata.name: Guidebook to the Marvel Cinematic Universe - Marvel's Ant-Man
